name: Approject
tagline: Risk Analysis, Project Plan, Financing and Management issues.
body:
### Welcome to Project Aplication Pages.
The purpose of this site is aimed as a basis to discuss about equipment and process engineering, in order to provide good requirement to develop applications softwares for the areas of risk analysis, project planning, financing and project management theme.

### Templates
We've crafted some handsome templates for you to use. Go ahead and continue to layouts to browse through them. You can easily find options and solutions before closing your ideas about the design you are conceiving.

### Authors and Contributors
You can mention sites and useful links to contribute to spread the knowlege of solution providers, processing engineering, equipment designers, financial agencies, bank credit line available and new methods of management.

### Support or Contact
Contact mario.e.almeida@gmail.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out the issues you need.
